mapper.select: SELECT hp.hno, hp.mno, hp.ino, hp.overview, hp.title, hp.map_x, hp.map_y, img.storage_path AS storage_path, hp.created_at, hp.updated_at, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotplace_likes hl WHERE hl.hno = hp.hno ) AS like_count FROM hot_place hp LEFT JOIN image img ON hp.ino = img.ino WHERE ST_Distance_Sphere( POINT(hp.map_x, hp.map_y), POINT(#{mapX}, #{mapY}) ) <= #{meter} ORDER BY like_count DESC

SELECT hp.hno, hp.mno, hp.ino, hp.overview, hp.title, hp.map_x, hp.map_y, img.storage_path AS storage_path, hp.created_at, hp.updated_at, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hotplace_likes hl WHERE hl.hno = hp.hno ) AS like_count FROM hot_place hp LEFT JOIN image img ON hp.ino = img.ino WHERE hp.hno = #{hno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hot_place (mno, ino, overview, title, map_x, map_y) VALUES (#{mno}, #{ino}, #{overview}, #{title}, #{mapX}, #{mapY})
mapper.update: UPDATE hot_place SET mno = #{mno}, ino = #{ino}, overview = #{overview}, title = #{title}, map_x = #{mapX}, map_y = #{mapY} WHERE hno = #{hno} AND mno = #{mno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hot_place WHERE hno = #{hno} AND mno = #{mno}
